name: Fly Ace
description:
Tap and hold to fly up! Try and reach the top whilst avoiding any obstacles that may get in your way!. The higher you go, the harder it gets!

Fly Ace Features:

- Simply and satisfying controls!
-Beautiful and mesmerising graphics!
- Variety of different levels and challenges!
- No IAP- Fly Ace is a full game from the moment you download it.
